abstract.t: Secure Sockets Layer version 3.0 (SSLv3) [RFC6101] is not sufficiently secure. This document requires that SSLv3 not be used. The replacement versions, in particular Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.2 [RFC5246], are considerably more secure and capable protocols. This document updates the backward compatibility section of RFC 5246 and its predecessors to prohibit fallback to SSLv3.
